nodes.text: Ganelon Shipyards was a shipyard located during the Cold War in the Large Scale Production Facilities of Upper Industrial Sector on Nar Shaddaa. In 3643 BBY Hedarr Soongh arranged a meeting with the Hunter at the shipyards.
Ganelon Shipyards appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Imperial Agent class mission on Nar Shaddaa.
